评论概述: Almost 4 years and still going strong!
评论详情: We run this fan every night!  I've got it setup on amazon plug so all we have to do is say "Alexa, turn on fan" and "Alexa, turn off fan"

评论概述: The best quality pedestal fan money can buy
类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: We needed a pedestal fan to transfer warm air from the wood stove in our family room into our living room.  Most pedestal fans oscillate, but we needed a fan that would  run a straight line.  We obviously paid top dollar for this excellent machine, and it is worth every penny.  I am more than old enough to remember when the "Voranado" line was the house brand for the "Two Guys from Harrison" department stores.  Buy the way, in the New York City /New Jersey area, "Voranado" is pronounced "Voron-nah do.We love the retro look.  May have to drill a hole in the base to secure the bottom a bit better.

The fan has a nice heavy weight, it’s also visually appealing, and it arrived free of damage. The fan isn’t very loud even when on the highest setting…yeah it’s pretty quiet for the most part. Has a nice strong breeze which I can be felt from half way across the room which is nice because most small fans aren’t as powerful and wouldn’t be able to provide much of a reach. The fan cools my room down within 20 minutes, so there’s that as well.
Just as cool as it looks. Wish I could get a larger one. Hoping it lasts

I love the retro look of this vornado retro mini fan. It is perfect in the laundry room that gets so hot due to our climate. It provides different fan speeds, and the size is perfect to put on top of an armoire.

I have 3 Vornado fans, one in each bedroom because I love them so much! They have the vintage look and are incredible quality. This one has two speeds, and is perfect for my daughter’s nursery! And the price point is amazing!

评论用户: Disappointed on the color!!👎🏻 I ordered the retro green. The color was no way near what the picture shows!  It came in a dark green; not the pretty light green. So if that is the color you want…” Beware!!”
评论详情: Color was no way near what the picture shows! Comes in a dark color. Not the pretty light green!

评论概述: Not your tacky utilitarian looking fan at all
评论详情: We had this old big funky white plastic fan in our bedroom. We had just moved into a new home that was retro style. I looked at that funky fan and thought there's got to be a cool retro style fan out there. This white big old tacky thing is tragic and has got to go. There it was, and it definitely has got a retro art look to it. I like that it's metal, has a solid and smooth feel to it as well as a rounded case. It's like it was really built when they were focused not just on what the fan can do but what it looks like as well. BUT the fan itself also works wonderful and is quiet. The air really does move along better too. This brand has been around forever and they seem still focused on quality and design!! Thanks for designing not just a fan but one that's got a cool vibe design to it.
Good size, attractive, good air flow, glad I bought it
Works as described with very kittle noise.
It would not work!
Cool looking fan very retro
I was so excited for this cute lil fan! As soon as I powered it up I could hear the motor but nothing worked. Tried on both speeds. Spoke nicely to it. Nothing. Returning.
Compact but works really well! It has three settings and is very sturdy. It adds a nice aesthetic touch to any room. I have this in my kitchen because it gets really warm when cooking.

评论概述: Adorable Fan, But My Daughter’s Still Wide Awake Listening to Sirens
评论详情: I bought the Vornado Jr. Vintage Fan for my daughter’s room because, well, it’s adorable. Those photos? Spot on. This fan is cute enough to make her room look straight out of a retro magazine.  Fun fact: Apparently, about 34.3% of adults use a fan for that sweet, sweet background noise that helps them drift off to dreamland (thanks, Sleep Doctor survey!). So naturally, I figured this fan would be our ticket to peaceful sleep. Spoiler: It’s not quite loud enough to drown out the urban lullaby of honking cars and sirens outside. Sure, it pushes air around and looks fabulous doing it, but if you’re looking for serious white noise, you might still need the good ol' box fan.  Bottom line: Five stars for style, three stars for sleep aid.
I purchased this fan in October of 2021 for $59 and the motor went out on it today after 3 years.

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: I bought one of these fans during the summer from a flea market. About the smaller one, and after realizing how powerful that was, I decided to invest in the larger one because it made sense. This is one of the best quality vans I think that you could possibly get. In all honesty they just don’t make things with this quality material anymore. There are three speed settings, and the tilt ability is also really good. The best thing about it is the fan power and because of the quality of the materials that they use, it worked so well that I didn’t have to buy an air conditioner. I was able to use the air conditioner that I had and use this fan to help because of the fan power. To me, it felt crazy to spend this much money on a van, especially considering you could get an air conditioner for almost this price, but again the quality of this item is worth the investment. I am very satisfied with this, and I definitely recommend it to anybody who is looking into getting one.
Very stylin'--I keep seeing it in movies! Very very quite and efficient. Feel like it's going to last a long time.
This fan worked okay (low airflow on both settings) for about a month and now it makes a horrendous buzzing sound which makes the fan unusable. It’s aesthetically pleasing but not worth the money

Buying mainly for looks and not air flow? Then you will be happy. Cute vintage fan. Really metal - lighter weight than a genuine vintage vornado but much quieter too. This does not move a whole lot of air but enough for my needs. Decent for a personal desk fan type situation or mostly decorative function. Want a lot of airflow? Then get a modern plastic vornado they move a ton more air.

评论概述: Cute but not worth the price
评论详情: Pros: -This fan is super cute and good for small spaces. Cons: -After 2 yrs, started having a ‘rattle’ noise when on. Tried to fix it to no avail. -No way to take it apart to clean -Stationary/non-oscillating -More expensive than better quality fans that aren’t as fashionable

I love my Vornado heater, and I was excited to get this fan. I love that it's metal instead of plastic, and the design looks great. However, it doesn't oscillate, and I can only feel it when it's pointed right at me. I can feel it from 20' away, but pointed right at me. If I move out of its direct path I no longer feel it. Disappointed.

评论概述: Stylish, compact, wish it were a bit stronger airflow.
评论详情: Quiet, compact, attractive fan. Wish the air flow was a little stronger. We use it as a fan in our guest room.
Looks nice.  Quiet on low speed, but very weak air stream.  High speed is better, but very noisy.  The older style fans made out of plastic are much better.
I love this fan! I actually bought it in two different sizes and colors I love it so much. It is on my nightstand, looks great, is QUIET and has a great air flow.

评论概述: Very quiet and cools down room quick
评论详情: I used it in my babies nursery during the summer and it would cool down his room by at least 2-3 degrees. Runs very quiet, great quality, and has a great look to it. I love the color

评论概述: WONDERFUL ! Worth every penny! Very well made and absolutely adorable!
评论详情: I didn't dislike anything! It is soooo cute, very well made and works beautifully! It goes very well w/ my vintage/antique furniture and such! This was an amazing 'find!' No complaint here; but did the original 'Vornado' Vfan have a cloth covered cord? It would give it more of a vintage look.

评论概述: The fan did not come with knob in the back.
评论详情: The fan did not come with a knob in the back. It’s impossible to adjust the speed. Horrible quality, very disappointed. Not to mention it’s quite ugly in person.
Good replacement for a vintage fan.

This is a great little fan. We appreciate that the base is pretty small compared to other fans we've had of this size, so it can fit nicely on a small table or desk without taking up too much space. But it is definitely quiet. Sometimes we use a fan in our room or the office for white noise, but this one doesn't provide that.

I live with my 71 year old uncle who plays his TV at 100% volume when he goes to bed at night. I bought this fan to help drown out the noise while also not being an eye sore in my bedroom. I didn’t want a quiet fan—I wanted something that would not allow me to hear the latest episode of 60 minutes on full blast. This fan has a good hum without being obnoxious. Even as small as it is, it helps diffuse the TV noise so I can actually fall asleep. Plus, it’s adorable. I probably would have sprung for the bigger one (ie more fan noise I’d imagine) if I could, but on a budget this does the trick.
Love the vintage look! Works great on my bathroom counter! Noise is minimal.

This little fan is just what I needed. It complements my mid-century modern decor perfectly. It’s not too loud and it gives off a good amount of air for being such a small fan. I placed it in front of my air vent to circulate the air conditioning more effectively.  I highly recommend it!  It’s made of metal and is very sturdy.  The paint looks excellent as well.

Love the color, style and size of this Pushes enough air to circulate my loft apartment very well and is adorable too. Sound is a soothing low whoosh, definitely not the same as a box fan racket! Great product.
The vintage look is spot-on with the performance of a modern, powerful fan!

评论概述: Only brand of fan any one should use
评论详情: Have several I use year round being in FL. Original one bought 15 years ago and still working.
This fan is pretty to look at. It's not powerful. It's not loud. I only recommend it for personal use as apposed to cooling an entire room. Made out of good materials and I think it will last.

I loved the appearance and it's nice and sturdy, however i expected the wind force to be a bit stronger. Can barely feel the low and the high is maybe a medium at best. I've decided to keep it and use it in my bathroom while applying cosmetics if it's hot. Not worth the money.

评论概述: Works as good as it looks.
评论详情: I have high, slanted ceilings in the bedroom and living room, so ceiling fans would be a lot of work and expense. And, I didn't want that aesthetic. The VFAN provides gentle, quiet air circulation, and the large, pedestal model works great for the living room. I even bought a small desk model, in green. A note on the green vs. creamy off-white; I was set on the cool green retro look for the larger fans, but changed my mind at the last minute. Glad I did. The green would have been too much, and clash with existing decor. The white is more subdued, and blends in well.

评论概述: Looks good, but it’s noisy and lacks power
评论详情: Even with the fan set on high speed, you have to sit too close to it to feel the breeze. Eight feet away and  you’ll barely feel it.

评论概述: Robust-looking fan, but the motor won't last you very long
评论详情: If you buy an expensive stylish metal fan for close to $200 you'd think you're buying something you can keep for life and repair as needed. I bought two. Unfortunately, the included motor in the first one stopped running after 6 years (after the warranty expired). I replaced the fuse and capacitor, made sure the switch was good, but motor doesn't turn. The company won't replace the motor and since I don't want to toss the whole fan in the garbage to replace it with another short-living one at the reduced cost they offered, I'm stuck. I'm looking around for some sort of motor replacement but so far I'm out of luck. The second one I'd purchased rattles on one of the speed settings, which indicates another motor problem, which I won't be able to replace when it craps out.  So, unless I can find a replacement motor, what looks like it would make a good antique one day is sadly no more of a keeper than the plastic fans they sell for a fraction of this cost. What a waste.
Moves air quietly and efficiently.  Sturdy.
I have an original Vornado Sr, the one with metal three fin fan blade. This new one is smaller has a plastic blade and the highest power lvl blows less then the lowest lvl of my old one.
Does a great job of circulating the air, even on low. Highly recommend!

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: Love, love, love this fan. It was fairly easy to put together and it operates so well. It feels like quality and looks like quality! Now, I'm actually glad my old fan died.
Very quiet and moves a lot of air. Looks great.
Only two speeds but quiet and heavy construction
So far so good. Size is what I was looking for, feels well built, looks beautiful, and seems to work great. Sound is smooth, and very quiet on low.

Fan blades are a little smaller than I expected but it really moves the air, and it's not loud. It's all metal, built solid. Overall, I really like it. Love the retro look. If your looking for a personal fan to match your vintage decor, this is the one to buy. If you're looking for a fan for a big room, get one of the these, but you might want to get the bigger one.

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: This gorgeous fan has kept me cool all summer.  Color is perfect in my rooms with Navajo White wood trim and ceilings, and pops against my various wall colors.  Love it!

The fan is the cutest thing you will find in the market, but it’s not really strong. It’s good enough for a breeze summer, but won’t be really effective for the hottest days. Also, it’s static, what reduces its ability to ventilate the entire room. I’ve got the smallest one, as I wanted it to fit in my bookshelf when not in use. It a bit heavier than I anticipated, but overall really cute.

This fan does wonders when it comes to cooling down a room!  I had issues with my first fan - it was rattling and making noises after only a month. I reached out to customer service and told them the issue, and they immediately replaced the fan. Fantastic customer service!!!

评论概述: Love this thing! It looks so cool!
评论详情: This fan looks great and gets the job done stylishly. Somewhere I have an actual vintage version of this fan and it still works. Vornado are a great company, making quality goods.

评论概述: Can I fall in love with a fan? (spoiler alert: yes)
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE THIS FAN!! I was choosing between the small one and this Jr. one. The small one because it's for a desktop and I need the space. The jr. because it's so gorgeous. So I decided to go for form in place of function and went with the jr. I am so glad I did because I don't mind sharing my space with such an aesthetically pleasing fan. It is so quiet on low that I've forgotten to turn it off at the end of the workday, but that quietness comes in handy if I want to sleep with it on during hot nights. On high it's the sound of a regular fan, and it packs a punch when it comes to breeze. I sometimes look over at it and feel such a nice calm feeling because the look of it is so wonderful. The fact that it's metal and not plastic is a bonus. The color choice and style was spot on. Whoever designed this needs a raise.

评论概述: Well built, but not enough power
评论详情: It was well built and very quiet, but with very limited power.

I have bought many many fans. over my life. I think moving air is just a must for comfort. By far the best quality fans I have owned have been vornados. I have a big one and this small one for beside my  bed. Both are great. The difference in quality between these fans and others are stark. These fans are quieter, move more air and the build quality is noticeably better. Better switches and pivot points. I wish they made mounted fans like ceiling fans.
Great fan, so quiet. Love it

评论概述: The best little fan in the world 🌎
评论详情: The motor in this fan can last 20 years.  It goes on forever. It very quiet on low. The construction is premium. You won't even know it is there. I have bought 2 over the past 10 years.
It’s quieter than I thought it would be!! Amazing desk fan

This vintage inspired fan is totally adorable, it was the perfect size for my daughter’s bedroom. She has to sleep with a fan on and this fan does a great job. No assembly, moves the air around really well and it is visually pleasing.
Circulates the air throughout the room.  A standout brand.

I bought a retro fan at a local home store, thinking I was saving money. But it started to rattle within days so it was no bargain. I took it back.  I bought this fan which was twice as expensive and about 100 times better. It's not just old-fashioned looking, it's built like an old fan, meaning it's heavy, sturdy and will last for years. It's even got a 5-year warranty.  Of course this fan is beautifully retro--like finding a vintage fan that actually works. But more than that, this fan is POWERFUL *and* QUIET!  On high, yes, you can hear it--it's moving a lot of air. But on low speed for overnight, where you want a soft breeze in the bedroom, it's virtually silent.  I love this fan so much I plan to buy another!

评论概述: Love this small but mighty vintage styled fan
评论详情: I am in love with this little fan! It seems ridiculous, and I recognize that, but this thing was an impulse buy and I couldn’t be happier with it.  The low setting is so quiet that my husband didn’t even notice I had it for the first several hours I used it. It still provides plenty of air movement on the ultra quiet low setting.  The higher setting is noticeably louder, but it really moves the air more than I would anticipate for such a small fan. The vintage styling makes it cute enough to leave out. I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for a small fan.
I have several of these fans at two locations. Not only are they pleasant to look at, they are basic, solid and do the job. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Compact design and durable, but a little noisy.
评论详情: The design is good and durable. But, it has a little of noise.

My fan finally broke after leaving it on literally 24 hours a day with the exceptions of when I’ve gone out of town, which hasn’t been a ton. I thought – wow that’s pretty good because I’ve had it awhile. Well, I just went to Amazon to buy the same fan because I liked it so much and realized I bought the first fan in 2017. So basically it’ll run for 24 hours a day for 7 years before it finally gives up. Pretty good.  It’s a small fan but puts out enough air for a bedroom. It’s not really loud but somehow drowns out my neighbors. Plus it’s really nice looking.  I really think Vornado is the way to go. I like it a lot more than other fans I’ve had.

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: Works as it should. Low in medium really don't put out any airflow. But the high setting works. Love the antique white color.
I was wanting to add a bit of airflow to a small room, and this does a decent job of it, and looks nice.

评论概述: Great small fan with cool vintage look
评论详情: Really like it!  This is a really nice vintage looking fan with a very solid build.  Super quiet on "low", but you can definitely hear it on medium and high settings, which is to be expected from pretty much any fan.
This fan is fantastic. It's super quiet perfect for your bedside or your desk. And it looks great
Looks good, sturdy, works well.

Love the Vornado. It works well and is super quiet. I use it with my wall AC unit, helps to distribute the cool air more efficiently. The finish and paint of the fan is beautiful. I have several older Vornado, they last forever. Was sad to see that they are now made in China instead of the US, but the quality seems to still be high. Probably the best fan for the money.

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: Sturdy. Pretty. Powerful. Very happy w our purchase. Worth the money & price. I suspect this will last forever. Saved us this summer as our house doesn’t have central air.
Nice fan. Looks decorative. I use it in the kitchen to help move the air. Could get hot in the kitchen in Texas.
I’ve bought a few different sizes. These fans are great. They look fantastic, and the performance is right. I’d buy this again if I needed.
We use it to keep the air flowing while sleeping. It's not too loud and works great for our intended purpose

类型: Style: VFAN Sr. PedestalColor: Vintage White
评论详情: We have all become so accustomed to mass-manufactured, standardized products that function well enough, that when something like this comes along it's special in some way. If I showed this to my grandpa calling it beautiful he'd chuckle, roll his eyes and say "what are you talking about, it's just a fan." He'd be right, too - it's functionally the same as all the other plastic Vornado fans. It is very cool looking and works very well compared to any box or tower fan though.  I think the price is outrageous, but the price on this one would've been $24 in 1960 dollars, which I've found is about right. Who knew?

评论概述: Get looking retro and good air
评论详情: Liked it very much

评论概述: Quiet, not terribly powerful, a handle would be nice.
评论详情: The delivery and manufacturer's packaging A+ I needed a fan to get the air-conditioning down an 8 foot hall to my living room. It has a plastic knob on back with 3 settings. Low which is adequate on a desk or if you want to sleep with a light breeze, high which is disappointing and off. For the steep price, a handle on top and a switch on the cord would have been nice. It is a solid metal build with adequate safety grills front and back. On high it's quiet enough. Cord length is ok approx 5ft 5 in. Note that this model (the junior) has a face grill size about 6.5 inches The fan blade is about the same. The color and design is very cool retro.  A big box store has the same style and size fan in plastic. Different brand. I'll add a comparison next week when I pick one up.

评论概述: Great looking and small, but effective
评论详情: Very effective small-form fan. The design is really nice-looking and the fan is weighty and substantial. It's also surpprisingly quiet for how effective it is. Pleased with this purchase. I will say the green color looks a little darker in person. But it still looks great.
I love this cute little fan! The medium green fan is a bit smaller than i expected, but it’s still great.

评论概述: Seems quality.  Looks nice and classy.
评论详情: It's pretty small and low powered but I knew that going in.  Looks artful vs plastic cruddy fan.

This little fan is a real trooper My AirCo recently went out during a heatwave this little fan ran continuously day in and day out never missed a beat never overheated and is quite as a whisper  I would recommend the VORNADO Brand to anyone looking for a great little fan.

评论概述: I bought it for looks, and the Vornado quality!
评论详情: I've had the plastic version before. This looks great in my bathroom, and is just right to help dry out the space. Wish it was slightly more powerful, but it functions well and is very quiet.

Always loved vornado products and this had lived up to my love. Tons of air flow without sounding like a wind tunnel, and the metal frame gives it a good sturdy weight. The retro design is also super cute and much more stylish than most bedside fans you see. So far I have no complaints!

评论概述: A fan of the Retro Fan!
评论详情: Looks great and retro!  Much better than a plain black fan! Highly recommend to upgrade your coolness

评论概述: Fab retro metal fan. A must for mid-century fans of fans...
评论详情: I replaced my junky plastic floor fan with this lovely, retro metal unit. It is small but puts out a lot of air. I like the fan noise for quick naps in the living room in the summer. It looks fabulous and fits our mid-century home. Delivery was very fast and free, as usual.
I sleep with it directly on me and it is just perfect for summer nights with windows open!
After 1 year the speed selector switch is broken. Turns loosely. Not sure if it can be fixed.

I love this fan. It's sturdy and well built. It does only have 2 settings, but they are both pretty quiet. Sometimes simple is better and I haven't really wanted anything more than the 2 intensity settings they have. If you want more control over the fan speed then this is definitely not for you.  It's perfect for a desk area. It doesn't really circulate a whole room at the Jr. size, but if you angle it at a desk you will feel a very nice breeze of air.

评论概述: Nice unit....failing after less than 2 years
评论详情: Well built...but loses power rapidly. Contacted customer service at Vornado because it has a 3 year warranty. Taking them forever to get back to me. Third Vornado product Ive purchased. Might be my last.

This is a really gorgeous fan. It is metal and has a very vintage design. My only issue is that low and medium speeds are barely indistinguishable. The high speed is kind of loud. Low is not really much air flow and medium is one notch more air flow than low. So to get good air flow, it needs to be on high. The Goldilocks of fans:!

评论概述: Love it... Returned the regular size and ordered the SR...
评论详情: I loved it so much, I upgraded to the SR... I need more air flow for a large room... It is smooth sounding and made to last... Only uses 45watts...

The fan is beautiful and sturdy. I give it 4 stars for the design alone. I disagree with  "powerful and far-reaching", but I kept it as a desk fan. I was trying to step up from my 7" dia. Blizzard by Holmes, but I have to admit that it's a bit less powerful. I do like how quiet it is compared to other fans of the same dimensions.I own a dyson bladeless fan and it's perfect for a decent size living room. I am an Interior Designer,  so I did study the difference among other brands before for some of my clients. I am thinking of buying another Vornado Fan Jr. for my night stand. It does just the  job close proximity, and the gorgeous retro design is worth the value.  I do recommend it for those who are after a quite, medium/strong breeze fan.

I am someone who usually loves the sound that a fan makes, but this fan makes a truly horrendous noise. There are only 2 settings - low and high. On low, it seems to be okay, but when you turn it up to high it literally sounds like a broken engine. I unfortunately throw out the box, so confident that a Vornado fan would be excellent. I had been a big fan, buying many of their products and models over the years. Now I am left with an expensive and defective fan. Do not waste your money
Great personal fan. Well made. Cools the area, provides nice air flow. Love the retro look.

评论概述: Beautiful and works as well as described
评论详情: Great style.

评论概述: i have to say, i'm a fan
评论详情: It blows, it makes the right sound for sleeping and it looks cool to boot. Take it from me *strike that* buy your own! Do i wish i had sprung for the bigger one, you know i do, nobody is going to argue bigger isn't better, the heart wants what the heart wants but the heart gets what i can afford.
Moves air but not as much as I presumed. Very quiet.

I have purchased two of these air circulators in white. They work very well and keep the air circulating throughout each room and keep them cooler as right now I’m using them in the summer. They are also very pretty being all metal. I got a lot of compliments on them. Basically just pull them out of the box and plug them in  jr size and they don’t take out much space on the table top. They are a good size and I keep mine on the highest speed because I like the air circulating.
